title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5904.3 - Approved technological areas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5904.3 - Approved technological areas

State Regulations

The foundation shall not approve any application unless it
concerns a technological area that is approved by the foundation as being
related to industries with significant potential for economic growth and
development in New York State and to the enhancement of productivity in various
industries located in New York State. Such areas shall include the general
areas of integrated electronics, optics, biotechnology and telecommunications, and such other general or specific areas as may from time to time be approved
by the foundation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

5904.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
